gantryballcoordinates moduleÂ¶

Ask for a folder of framegrabber images. Send each image to the detectcircles function to get back image coordinates Get an array of ball coordinates for all images. Plot coordinates against the gantry angle.

Label and identify the balls by the Y position in the images.

When couch and gantry are changed we can
